page.title: 16 SHOPPING
page.content: SHOPPING IN GRAVESEND HAS BECOME EASIER SINCE THE INTRODUCTION OF TWO SHOPPING CENTRES AT THE HEART OF THE TOWN.THE FIRST WAS THE ANGLESEA CENTRE,WHICH SELLS GOODS INCLUDING BOOKS,SPORTS ITEMS,FOOD AND MEDICAL APPLIENCES.THE SEOND ONE WHICH IS MORE MODERN IS NAMED THE SAINT GEORGES CENTRE,WHICH WAS FOUNDED IN 1982 AT THE TIME OF THE ROYAL WEDDING OF H.R.H.PRINCE CHARLES TO LADY DIANA SPENCER.THE CENTRE IS ONE OF THE MOST MODERN ARCHETICUAL DESIGNS IN GRAVESEND ALONG WITH IT'S UNDERGROUND MULTI-STORY CARPARKS WHICH IS SITUATED DIRECTLY BELOW THE CENTRE. THE TOWN ALSO INCLUDES MANY LARGE CHAIN STORES INCLUDING SAINSBURYS,TESCOS MARKS&SPENCERS AND BRITISH HOME STORES. THE HIGH STREET IS NOT THE MAIN SHOPPING AREA IN THE TOWN.THE MAIN SHOPPING STREET IS CALLED NEW ROAD & IS ABOUT HALF A MILE LONG.
